title: Shipwrecked & Complicated Mothers
teaser:

contentencoded:
June Cross is born to a white mother and black father and is asked to keep her two different worlds separate.
 
Mishka Shubaly is the youngest crew member in a sailboat shipwreck, and must trek a treacherous path to save the day.
 
Susan Duncan cares for her dying mother and finally bridges the gulf between them.
